Source file src/github.com/TIBCOSoftware/flogo-lib/logger/logger.go

     1	package logger
     2	
     3	import (
     4		"fmt"
     5	)
     6	
     7	type Logger interface {
     8		Debug(args ...interface{})
     9		Debugf(format string, args ...interface{})
    10		Info(args ...interface{})
    11		Infof(format string, args ...interface{})
    12		Warn(args ...interface{})
    13		Warnf(format string, args ...interface{})
    14		Error(args ...interface{})
    15		Errorf(format string, args ...interface{})
    16		SetLogLevel(Level)
    17	}
    18	
    19	type LoggerFactory interface {
    20		GetLogger(name string) Logger
    21	}
    22	
    23	type Level int
    24	
    25	const (
    26		DebugLevel Level = iota
    27		InfoLevel
    28		WarnLevel
    29		ErrorLevel
    30	)
    31	
    32	var levelNames = initLevelNames()
    33	
    34	func initLevelNames() map[string]Level {
    35		newLevelNames := make(map[string]Level, 4)
    36		newLevelNames["DEBUG"] = DebugLevel
    37		newLevelNames["INFO"] = InfoLevel
    38		newLevelNames["WARN"] = WarnLevel
    39		newLevelNames["ERROR"] = ErrorLevel
    40		return newLevelNames
    41	}
    42	
    43	var logFactory LoggerFactory
    44	
    45	func RegisterLoggerFactory(factory LoggerFactory) {
    46		logFactory = factory
    47	}
    48	
    49	// GetLogger returns the Logger using the logFactory registered.
    50	// Returns nil if no factory is found
    51	func GetLogger(name string) Logger {
    52		if logFactory == nil {
    53			return nil
    54		}
    55		return logFactory.GetLogger(name)
    56	}
    57	
    58	func GetLevelForName(name string) (Level, error) {
    59		levelForName, ok := levelNames[name]
    60		if !ok {
    61			return 0, fmt.Errorf("Unsupported Log Level '%s'", name)
    62		}
    63		return levelForName, nil
    64	}
    65
